#
#   ENTITY BasicTypes {
#       TEXT            text    *
#       NUMBER          numberLong
#       NUMBER          numberDouble
#       DOUBLE          double
#       LONG            long
#       BOOL            bool
#       DATE            date
#       TIME            time
#       DATETIME        datetime
#   }
#
#   ENTITY Category {
#       TEXT    name  *
#       TEXT    description
#   }
#
#   ENTITY TypeWithCategory {
#       TEXT        code  *
#       Category    category
#   }
